toBe.description: expects the first argument to be equal with the second one

toBeCloseTo.description: expects the first argument to be close to the second one base on the delta

toBeGreaterThan.description: expects the argument is greater than or equal

toBeGreaterThanOrEqual.description: expects the argument is greater than

toBeInTheDocument.description: expects the argument to be in the document

toBeInstanceOf.description: expects the argument is less than

toBeLessThan.description: expects the argument is less than

toBeLessThanOrEqual.description: expects the argument is less than or equal

toContain.description: expects the list contains the item (===)

toContainEqual.description: expects the list contains the item (equals)

toEqual.description: expects the first argument to be equal with the second one

toHaveBeenCalled.description: returns true if the spy was called

toHaveBeenCalledTimes.description: returns true if the spy has been called given times

toHaveBeenCalledWith.description: returns true if the spy has been called with

toHaveBeenLastCalledWith.description: returns true if the spy has been last called with

toHaveLength.description: expects the object to have length

toHaveProperty.description: returns true if the argument matches the second object

toMatch.description: returns true if the argument matches the second value

toMatchInlineSnapshot.description: returns true if the argument matches the most recent inline snapshot

toMatchObject.description: returns true if the argument matches the second object

toMatchSnapshot.description: returns true if the argument matches the most recent snapshot

toStrictEqual.description: expects the first argument to be strictly equal with the second one

toThrow.description: expects that the method will throw an error

toThrowError.description: expects that the method will throw an error

toThrowErrorMatchingInlineSnapshot.description: expects that the method will throw an error matching the inline snapshot

toThrowErrorMatchingSnapshot.description: expects that the method will throw an error matching the snapshot
